Module ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2
Package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.shapes

Class Text

java.lang.Object
ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.shapes.Shape
ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.shapes.Rectangle
ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint.shapes.Text
public class Text extends Rectangle
This class represents a Text shape that can be added to the canvas. A TextBox is defined by its start and end points, and the text it contains. This class represents the style of the textbox, so the style of the text entered by users is not controlled by the shape's PropertiesPanel.

  • Constructor Details

    • Text

      public Text(Point start, Point end, PaintProperties properties)
      Constructs a new Text shape with the given start and end points, and paint properties. Initializes text content and font settings.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting point of the Text shape.
      end - The ending point of the Text shape.
      properties - The paint properties of the Text shape.

  • Method Details

    • setupTextField

      public void setupTextField(Point start)
      Sets up the TextField at the specified starting point. The TextField allows users to input text in the shape.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting point of the Text shape to position the TextField.

    • paint

      public void paint(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g2d)
      Paints the Text shape on the canvas. It draws the border and fills the shape if required, and also renders the text content if it's not empty.
      Overrides:
      paint in class Rectangle
      Parameters:
      g2d - The graphics context used for painting.

    • fill

      protected void fill(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g2d)
      Fills the Text shape with its fill color and displays the text content inside the shape. The text is positioned with an offset to avoid overlapping the shape's boundary.
      Overrides:
      fill in class Rectangle
      Parameters:
      g2d - The graphics context used for filling.

    • getTextField

      public javafx.scene.control.TextField getTextField()
      Gets the TextField associated with the Text shape, allowing user input.
      Returns:
      The TextField used for text input in the shape.

    • setTextField

      public void setTextField(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField)
      Sets the TextField associated with the Text shape.
      Parameters:
      textField - The TextField to be associated with the Text shape.

    • setTextContent

      public void setTextContent(String textContent)
      Sets the content of the text in the Text shape.
      Parameters:
      textContent - The content to set for the Text shape.

    • move

      public void move(double dx, double dy)
      Moves the Text shape by the specified amounts in the x and y directions. The TextField position is also updated accordingly.
      Overrides:
      move in class Rectangle
      Parameters:
      dx - The change in the x-coordinate.
      dy - The change in the y-coordinate.
